issues.description: The solution file fix_vec_sub.asm declares extern fix_vec_sub_asm instead of exporting it (missing a global directive), while the template marks fix_vec_sub_asm as global. This inconsistency will prevent students from linking the fix_vec_sub_asm symbol correctly and lead to linker errors.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, replace the line 'extern fix_vec_sub_asm' with 'global fix_vec_sub_asm' so that the symbol is exported for linking, matching the template.
